chat.title: comment
chat.message: (1) there are almost no circumstances where bedrest is an appropriate order for an obstetric patient. This option should be removed. (2) ASA should include dosing option for 162mg po qhs. (3) If given for obstetric indications, all ASA dosing should be administered qhs (I can dig up the pharmacology paper for this if needed). (4) I think syphillis testing indications here need to be updated to be in line with current testing guidelines. (5) consult option for indigenous liasion. (6) We should add order sentences for different ultrasound timings. (7) clarify that most antenatal serologies and other invesitgations do not need to be repeated if already done in pregnancy.
